name: Feedback
description: In response to taking psychic or aetheric damage from an adjacent creature, you force the attacker to make a concentration check against half the damage dealt before mitigation, or they become stunned. If you do not roll at least 2 successes on your spell check, you must make the same check against being stunned.
charge: The spell works against physical damage, and the attacker takes half the damage dealt before mitigation.
